attributes.title: Nearly made me go blind
attributes.review: Upon downloading this app, I was immediately greeted with a photo of this disgusting orange creature, very unpleasant. In fact, the horrid sight burned itself into my retinas and now I am severely visually impaired for the rest of my life. Would not recommend.

attributes.title: NO T H A N K S✨✨
attributes.review: O M G when I got on the app and looked through it, I SAW HIS PENIS, that was not good to see because it was small, this app is D I S G U S T I NG, it took months to download, this is honestly the worst app I’ve ever had, he shouldn’t have a app or even buildings, This app should get off of the App Store rn✨✨✨✨

attributes.title: disgusting
attributes.review: When I opened the app I saw a picture of an orange 🤭🤮. But then I came to realize that he’s homophobic and racist and so many other things, so I quickly undownloaded the app and left a bad review as you should.

attributes.title: Ew
attributes.review: I expected this to be a NEWS APP? Seeing as it is a #1 news app but all i saw was lying? and fake news? I will not stand a racist orange cheeto puff to tell me what to do. This is a terrible app 0/10 wouldn’t recommend to anyone. My eyes and ears are now scarred forever.

attributes.title: terrible app🙈😩👁👄👁
attributes.review: Not only did the app show multiple images of a Cheeto man but it was just so unappealing 🤭. The app caused my phone to glitch and it was very unorganized. I don’t recommend getting it guys. It is just too bad of an app 😗💅

attributes.title: No ❤️
attributes.review: Very very very offensive app. It was just very offensive for me and my eyes, I wouldn’t want anyone to have this app 10/10 WOULD NOT recommend, very sad and disappointing and has a kid named Barron hostage poor kid. I just wouldn’t want to see this app surfacing.

attributes.title: No just no
attributes.review: This app is just not acceptable for this wonderful AppStore. This app needs to be taken down immediately. I downloaded and deleted it right after just TERRIBLE APP.  Can’t believe it was here in the first place JUST NO

attributes.title: Awful app
attributes.review: Someone told me to download this app so I can make America great again, but the app only advertises Donald trump (who is not capable of making good decisions for the country). Might be a glitch? Developers should just delete the app

attributes.title: Don’t bother wasting your time.
attributes.review: If you are getting this app to try and find the good in trump I am sorry to inform you that this app will only make you hate him more.  At this point anyone is better than Trump. 👎🏻

attributes.title: This app is not useful at all🤮
attributes.review: It’s full of crab and nothing in this app would make sense to me I’m definitely deleting this app  for the people who want to download in the future I would explicitly warn them to not download🤮🤮🤮🤮🤢🤢🤢
